Race.SpecificTitle: PW Law Enforcement Dist. -- 15.72 Mills Renewal - Sheriff - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of Catahoula, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a tax of fifteen and seventy-two (15.72) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $613,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of providing additional funding for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. No. 1 -- 6.41 Mills Continuation - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 1 of the Parish of Catahoula, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of six and forty-one hundredths (6.41) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $14,490 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities and equipment, purchasing fire trucks and other fire fighting equipment and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for fire hydrant rentals and service, said millage to represent an eighteen hundredths of a mill (.18) increase over the 6.23 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2017 pursuant to an election held on October 20, 2007?
